data.text: @Dominiclangan @bt_uk BT told us all the problems were in the house. Not their problem. Switched to Sky, instantly worked‚Ä¶
@bt_uk When does your mobile roaming charges start

@bt_uk engineer came round today. Although the issue not solved he  tried everything and was was helpful. He had to factory reset my hub and liked how he took his ear piercing out to use as a point to do so. Covid precautions long gone as body piercings are used as tools üòÇ
@bt_uk Worked this time, thanks :-)
@bt_uk Where should I send me details? And do you have contact details for the loyalty department?
@Dominiclangan @bt_uk Sky have always been great for me and always happy to negotiate with long term customers
@bt_uk my broadband is down, no outages reported on your website for my number. No customer service. No chat service available. Been on hold on your web messaging service 20 minutes. Help
@bt_uk broadband has been down since 1.30pm! No updates at all. What is going on?

Current speeds with @EE because we have to rely on them to hotspot our machines since it's taking @bt_uk over month to install our broadband. Hey at least there isn't a pandemic and we're working from home. First world country ü§£ https://t.co/lrSQDv4CIR
@Dominiclangan @bt_uk Try plusnet.  owned by BT but great customer service!
@bt_uk If anyones wondering if you get responses from dming them- you don‚Äôt. Happy to be of service.
@bt_uk Broadband not working
@WeAreOpenreach no wonder the phone doesn‚Äôt work?  80year old mother needs a phone that‚Äôs reliable!! @BBCWatchdog @helptheaged @bt_uk #shoddy https://t.co/6Y0bjm87x6

I have not had any @BT_UK broadband for over 2 weeks now. At my wit‚Äôs end if I‚Äôm honest. Rung them numerous times, raised 2 complaints and written to the Omsbudman but got me nowhere. My 32 years with BT are coming to an end. Who do you recommend for my broadband replacement?

@CBLsupport your support is abysmal. I have sent you numerous messages and emails over the last 3 weeks with no reply! I can only assume your service is as poor as your communication, in which case you can cancel my order I have waited for 6 weeks and I‚Äôll stay with @bt_uk

@bt_uk Any way you could elaborate on if BT is revamping the network in Newcastle or just taking the piss?
Everyone in the areas internet is in and out, and best I get told is "reset your routeur" by an automated text.

@EveryToryOut @charliekaliroy @bt_uk @Trustpilot I‚Äôm not defending them. But at least there‚Äôs a choice now for our comms (phones  & broadband) The days when they had a monopoly were terrible. Standing charges, excessive connection costs, restrictions on when you could call. Maybe it‚Äôs not down to privatisation, just evolution?

@GrimTim_GTID @charliekaliroy As an unfortunate @bt_uk customer I wish it would go under, there‚Äôs a reason for their @Trustpilot rating

@bt_uk No, he‚Äôs been told he has to wait until Monday to pay the bill.

@bt_uk on hold for 30:17mins just to be told my 90yr old father‚Äôs landline has been cut off due to unpaid bill. This, after he had been reassured bill was paid. Shocking treatment of the elderly & unacceptable customer service. Why do we have to put up with this?

@bt_uk what has happened to your customer service? My broadband is down due to a broken drop wire caused by @WeAreOpenreach engineer fixing a drooping drop wire next door. Appointment 15th no show. OK now 17th. No show. 18th no show! Sir defo 19th...16.30 now and guess what!!
@bt_uk I have sent you a direct message.

@bt_uk Seeing some improvement, had very little dropouts since I disconnected it. Open reach engineer said he would put it on my report back to BT. So I guess I will phone Monday if not heard anything and If I see no improvements with the hybrid disconnected.

@bt_uk When are you going to provide a robust internet service to my local area. I lost 4 hours of work yesterday and when I tried again today it disappears again. I would like to compensated please #BT #Internetservice
@bt_uk Look up my details and see the notes. Shocking service.

@bt_uk Open reach here for 3hrs, no fault found. Recommended a new Hub. Bt Home tech Guy was here 17th. No fault found.
Am at a loss tbh. Disconnected the hybrid hub from the smart hub.  I got a funny feeling because that was the only change in the last few weeks to my network.
@bt_uk It‚Äôs not worked for over 2 hours just showing a purple light. We‚Äôve done all the normal trouble shooting.

@bt_uk Is that a joke? On the 14th I could be connected on the 18th, now on the 19th I cant be connected until the 25th. Why has the delay increased? That's not as soon as possible, the equipment is all there, this delay is unacceptable, due to your cancelling my order!! Wtf??

@bt_uk I shouldn't have to wait for anything, I was assured I'd be on by yesterday. Moved house with autistic teenagers and you've left us with no TV no Internet, after poaching me from @VodafoneUK claiming to be cheaper! Then you try doubling my charges! What a joke!

@bt_uk I've just spoken to someone, the new order has now had to be cancelled and I cant order for 24 hours. Absolutely abysmal service, marketing ploy? You cancel my original order then double my charges! I'm now without any connection for over a week! Disgusting #badservice

@bt_uk hi there, I'm very unhappy with your service, I arranged to change my services to a new address, should have gone live yesterday. Turns out someone, not me, cancelled that order. Now my package has virtually doubled in price and I've got no service until the 25th
@bt_uk Connected via ethernet. I have restarted broadband incase that was causing the issue but still no difference
@bt_uk my youview box has crashed/ Frozen 6 times in the last 3 days. Have restored to factory settings and turned off by the plug disconnected and it has frozen again. Any advice?

@bt_uk Many thanks Claire but l doubt that you can help as use already know there is a problem
l have been complaining since boxing day
@bt_uk Any chance of finding out why my speed's have dropped to 0.03mp and use can't seem to fix it
@bt_uk Ok many thanks. I‚Äôll change passwords  I was advised BT had their database hacked and leaked.

@MattKeena @bt_uk when i moved my mother to Virgin phone , BT demanded ¬£98 disconnection fee. I told them to produce a contract with two wet signatures showing where she agreed to that in 1972, or id see them in court, they didnt ring back.

So @bt_uk you charging me ¬£7.50 late fee from my last bill‚Ä¶ only reason it was late was because you didn‚Äôt let me know it was due so that‚Äôs your fault not mine, I‚Äôm not paying the  ¬£7.50 late fee https://t.co/ioPOpTvj1Y

@bt_uk But then decided not to and it seems to be a problem because the old ‚Äúpackage‚Äù no longer exists but she doesn‚Äôt want the new package they pushed her into.
@OpenreachHelp @TalkTalk @bt_uk between these three companies trying to get broadband connected is robbing me of my will to live

@bt_uk Yes there has been a problem with changing the package but that‚Äôs just the tip of the iceberg it‚Äôs getting beyond a joke. Every time we speak with someone they don‚Äôt have a clue or they cut off the phone! Initially someone spoke about upgrading the packaging to which she agreed

@bt_uk

Thursday: text to say it‚Äôll arrive today (it didn‚Äôt)
Saturday: email to say if I don‚Äôt return it by May 15th I‚Äôll be charged ¬£50

Unbelievable.

@BuffyIles I'm sorry that happened Buffy,

I can look into this for you. Once the order is completed I'm sure we can get the service provided at the original price. DM me the full address and account holders name. ^Kevin
